A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Gawd awful movie. Don't understand how critics are praising this. Star Wars aside\, the movie is a mess. Overly long\, filled with plot holes and unnecessary story directions. Lack of real character development. Emotionally uneven -- the humor was incredibly forced and ill-timed. B-movie-campy-bad in terms of humor.  And the story\, being praised as new and different\, was just a mashup of Empire and Return of the Jedi.  This film is a mess an\, honestly\, I don't know what they're going to do for episode 9.  The franchise isn't salvageable\, at this point.
